website_summaries.verdict: Other balms require scraping and warming before use, but this conditioner is much easier to apply. We recommend it to beard wearers who want a lighter weight balm as a supplement to other beard-related products.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many beard balms over the past two years and Urban Prince is my favorite!! It is the right density, easy to apply, and not heavy or too waxy. This product gives a light sheen to my beard with a very slight clean scent. Most balms are to fragrant- not this one. I also highly recommend Urban Prince beard comb!!
